duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and assist Team Managers in meeting targeted performance levels through creating a motivated and dynamic team.
Contribute to the overall success target and the strategy for EMEA Travel & Lifestyle.
Be the key driver of the day-to-day service delivery for our operational business in North America.
Work closely with other Ten offices across the globe and use synergies in terms of service delivery throughout the different markets.
Act as a deputy to the Director of North America.
Contribute to the strategy for NAM Travel & Lifestyle and ensuring plans for growth in efficiencies, member satisfaction, and profitability.
Provide input into Periodical business forecasting at department/team level.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 7+ years proven leadership at a strategic and/or department level including management of managers.
Knowledge of the travel and lifestyle industry and dealing with UHNW or HNW clients.
Commitment to supporting the delivery of Ten's environmental, social and governance goals, and promoting policy adherence.
